message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $12000 for it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking for a lower price. I would like to propose $10000 for the product.
I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the current market value and my budget, I would like to propose $10500 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $11500. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose $11000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11500, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose $11250 for the product.
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob, but I'm willing to give you one last chance. I can offer it to you for $11750, but that's as low as I can go.
After giving it some more thought, I believe $11500 is a fair price for the product.
